post:
TNAHosting is happy to offer some deals on KVM and Dedicated servers. We’ve been in business since 2012, providing a variety of reliable and cost-effective services. All servers are located in Chicago, IL. 


--SSD KVM--

All Plans: https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?gid=9
SolusVM Control Panel 
DDoS Protection 

**4GB SSD KVM**
* 2x vCPU
* 4GB RAM
* 40GB SSD
* 10TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbps
* 1 IPv4 (IPv6 Available)
* $5/month - [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=90 "Order Here")

**1GB SSD KVM**
* 2x vCPU
* 1GB RAM
* 15GB SSD
* 5TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbps
* 1 IPv4 (IPv6 Available)
* $15/year - [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=91 "Order Here")


--Dedicated Server--
  
SynergyCP Control Panel
Automated OS Installs
IP KVM
Remote Reboot
DDoS Protection 
  
**E3-1230v2 Dedicated Server**
* E3-1230v2 - 4 Cores / 8 Threads @ 3.3GHz / 3.7GHz Turbo
* 16GB DDR3
* 1TB HDD
* 20TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbps OR 100Mbps Unmetered
* /29 IPv4 (IPv6 Available)
* $24/month - [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=72&promocode=1230V2-YJRTHDBG "Order Here") [Promocode: 1230V2-YJRTHDBG]


Virtual servers are setup instantly after payment. Dedicated servers will be setup within 1-3 business days.

Chicago Looking Glass: [http://lg.chi2.tnahosting.net/](http://lg.chi2.tnahosting.net/ "http://lg.chi2.tnahosting.net/")

We accept PayPal, Major Credit/Debit Cards (Stripe), and Bitcoin.

Have questions or need something custom? Feel free to PM me or [open a sales ticket](https://tnahosting.net/billing/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=2 "open a sales ticket").
